node.description: Kotohime Fuma is a woman from the Fuuma clan who sided with Orochimaru alongside Arashi Fuma, Jigumo Fuma, Kagero Fuma, and Kamikiri Fuma when the clan fell on hard times. Orochimaru taught her how to play a Koto. She also demonstrated an ability to extend her hair around an opponent.    She seduced Jiraiya in Orochimaru's lair, telling him that she was Orochimaru's mistress, and lured him to a room where both of them will be crushed by the ceiling. Jiraiya managed to prevent that and she is currently living with Hanzaki Fuma and Sasame Fuma.
Giichi worked for Tazuna as a construction worker on his bridge. Though Giichi worked longer than many other crew members, he too quit after fearing for his safety.

Gatou was a shipping magnate and founder of Gatō Company. He also was secretly a drug dealer as well as the owner of a smuggling business and attempted to take control of the Land of Waves. Manga Debut: Chapter #10 Anime Debut: Naruto Episode #6

(Source: Narutopedia)

While he was a member of the group he began to feel guilty for what he was doing. Gantetsu thought he was saving the orphans, but he still knew that losing their parents was something awful and decided to put a stop to the ninja drop-outs. He saved the children from the houses they razed, hiding them in the Forest of Bewilderment. He also stole the treasure they had stolen together, and then he let his comrades to believe that he was captured so that they would come "rescue" him in order to learn where the treasure is. He hoped that by doing so his former comrades would get caught and that would be the end of the ninja drop-outs. Despite this, he knows that he can never completely atone for his crimes.

Mebuki Haruno (春野メブキ, Haruno Mebuki) is a kunoichi of Konohagakure and the wife of Kizashi and mother of Sakura Haruno.  Anime Debut: Naruto Shippūden Episode #271 Movie Debut: Naruto: Shippuuden Movie 6 - Road to Ninja  (source: Narutopedia)

Tonton is Tsunade's ninja pig, often kept in the care of Shizune. She is always seen wearing a pearl collar and a dark red jacket. 

Tonton's sense of smell is noted to be even finer than that of a ninja dog. She has reportedly smelled debt collectors coming and saved Tsunade from them countless time. She was also able to direct Shizune, Jiraiya, and Naruto to Tsunade's location after she was locked in battle. Also, despite her small size, she is strong enough to carry several crates at least as large as her.

In the anime, Tonton once performed a Transformation Technique to appear as Tsunade. However, while doing so, she was still unable to speak.

Yagura was a shinobi from Kirigakure and the host of the Three-Tailed Giant Turtle. When the Three-Tails was captured by Akatsuki, it had no host and roamed out in the wild. Why the beast was removed from this jinchūriki is unknown.  Because Yūkimaru has some control over the Three-Tails, and because he has some resemblance to this jinchūriki, it is speculated that they have some connection to each other, however Yūkimaru is a anime-only character that does not appear in the manga.
